thread.title: Lonzo and LaVar Ball predict how many NBA titles Lonzo will win
thread.title_full: Lonzo and LaVar Ball predict how many NBA titles Lonzo will win

title: Lonzo and LaVar Ball predict how many NBA titles Lonzo will win
text:
Mar 29, 2017 at 9:35p ET 0Shares 
Lonzo Ball is confident he’ll be one of the NBA’s all-time greats. He’s just not quite as sure as his father, LaVar. 
The two Ball men stopped by the In The Zone podcast with Chris Broussard this week to talk Lakers, Lonzo’s shooting form, the Big Baller Brand, and much more. Along the way, they stopped to play a little game of one-on-one — sort of. 
Broussard asked both Lonzo and LaVar a series of questions and had the duo write down their answers on individual whiteboards. When it came time to predict how many rings Lonzo will win, there was a bit of a disagreement: LaVar Ball says that Lonzo Ball will win more than 6 NBA titles.
